Copper.desc: The lowest form of coined currency

Gold.desc: The highest form of coined currency.

Animal Fur.desc: A fur pelt harvested from a killed animal

Gambeson.desc: A padded defensive jacket constructed out of linen or wool. Can protect the wearer more than one might think.

Spear.desc: A weapon with a long shaft and a pointed tip. A common and useful weapon due to its long reach.

Dagger.desc: An tool that can be also used as an easily concealed weapon. Can be very dangerous in the right hands.
